mapper.select: select * from stock a where a.id>=#{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into stock (id, stock_name, stock_no, update_time, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, stock_name, stock_no, update_time, create_time from stock
